overview:
Chris is an accomplished Internet entrepreneur. Most recently he served as Chief Operating Officer of Adteractive, a leading online performance marketing company. In 2001 he co-founded Sugar Media, a broadband services platform, which was sold to 2Wire, a leading supplier of DSL equipment and services. Sugar Mediaâ€™s technology powers AT&Tâ€™s Homezone digital media service. Prior to founding Sugar Media, Chris was the CFO and ultimately CEO of BlueLight.com, Kmartâ€™s e-commerce and Internet service provider subsidiary.

Prior to Bluelight.com, Chris spent 10 years executing merger and financing transactions at leading firms, including Morgan Stanley and Evercore Partners. He graduated Phi Beta Kappa and magna cum laude from Dartmouth College and earned an MBA from the Stanford Graduate School of Business.

Source : Marinsoftware.com

funding_round.source_description: MyVR Raises $1.4M From YC, SV Angel, Chris Dixon To Attack The $85B Vacation Rental Industry
